title: Did the Viking missions discover life on Mars 50 years ago? These scientists think so
description: The key to solving the mystery of the Viking results is the discovery of perchlorate on the Martian surface in 2008.
content: The key to solving the mystery of the Viking results is the discovery of perchlorate on the Martian surface in 2008.
